item.title: Bluetooth Headset on ArchLinux
item.description: After 4 days struggling, I finally make bluetooth headset working on my ArchLinux. Following is the detailed how-to which shows how to enable bluetooth playing. ###Software Installation Currently blueman is still the best bluetooth management software, we can install it via: $ yaourt blueman 1 aur/blueman-bzr 726-2 [installed] (38) GTK+ bluetooth management utility Then we have to install bluez related items: $ pacman -S bluez-utils bluez-libs python2-pybluez $ yaourt -S bluez4 $ yaourt pulseaudio-bluez4 ###Bluetooth Configuration First make sure your bluetooth service is enabled.
